contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 6, 1906 D Llandilo Contest (Class A)
Llandilo Contest (Class A) 10 Test Piece Contest Llandilo Contest llandilo-contest-class-a
Llewellyn
Llandilo, Pembrokeshire, Wales, UK 1st prize £12, 2nd prize £6, 3rd prize £3. March contest 1st Cwmtawe, 2nd Tycroes. 6 bands competed.
March 10, 2012, 9:16 a.m. Sept. 15, 2018, 7:10 a.m.
1 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Jim Woodhead
2 Tycroes Silver D. Williams
3 Morgan's Cwmtawe Ystalyfera Evan John Evans
Unknown Result Protheroe's Silver Thomas Proctor
Unknown Result Ystalyfera Public Charles Anthony Morgan
Unknown Result Trebanos Public Thomas Hanney
